description: Discover how Walmart is revolutionizing the retail supply chain with blockchain technology, enhancing transparency, food safety, and operational efficiency. Learn about their journey, challenges, achievements, and future prospects.
keywords: Walmart, blockchain, retail supply chain, transparency, food safety, blockchain technology, IBM, supply chain efficiency, real-time tracking, smart contracts, consumer trust, cost reduction, competitive advantage
title: Walmart's Blockchain Revolution in Retail Supply Chain
